name: Too many open files
description: Open files percentage is greater than the configured threshold

fields.name: content
fields.value:
1. Check if there are any unnecessary or redundant files that can be closed or removed. This includes checking for any orphaned processes or services that may be consuming excessive file handles.
 2. Increase the maximum number of open files limit on your system. However, this should be done with caution as it can expose your system to potential security risks if not managed properly. You
